title: The Witcher
description:
You can't outrun destiny just because you're terrified of it. Henry Cavill is Geralt of Rivia.

THE WITCHER | MAIN TRAILER | NETFLIX https://youtube.com/netflix The witcher Geralt, a mutated monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
